pageDescription: Phetsiam PE Pipe, PS Standard, is Asia's leading Manufacturer and supplier of HDPE electrical pipes, HDPE and PB water pipes. More than 20 years of exceeding standards set by the Provincial Waterworks Authority, ISO 9001, 14001, 45001, MIT, TIS.
welcomeMessage: Our brand “PS Standard” is a commitment to prioritizing unparalleled value for our clients and partners through a relentless pursuit of excellence, efficiency, and innovation.
whyChooseUsMessage: Experience unparalleled quality – Leading provider in Thailand's Water and Electrical Authorities. With over 20 years of expertise, delivering excellence at an affordable price.
title: Excellence Meets Affordability
subtitle: PE & PB Pipe Solutions
companyAddress: 496/6 Soi Jareonkij, Rama IV Rd., Mahaphuttharam Sub-district, Bangruk District, Bangkok
